description: This header file defines the class `CloudStoreImplementation` which implements the interfaces `Exchange::IStore2` and `Exchange::IConfiguration` for a cloud storage component within the WPEFramework plugin architecture. It contains declarations of methods for configuration and store management, such as register, unregister, set, get, delete key/namespace operations, and internal pointer management.

classes.name: CloudStoreImplementation
classes.description: A class implementing storage and configuration interfaces for cloud storage, handling registration, key/value management and configuration.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Performs configuration of the CloudStoreImplementation with the provided service shell.

methods.name: uint32_t Register(IStore2::INotification * notification)
methods.description: Registers a notification callback for store events if the internal store pointer is valid.

methods.name: uint32_t Unregister(IStore2::INotification * notification)
methods.description: Unregisters a notification callback for store events if the internal store pointer is valid.

methods.name: uint32_t SetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,const string & value,const uint32_t ttl)
methods.description: Sets a key-value pair in the store within the ACCOUNT scope if the internal store pointer is valid.

methods.name: uint32_t GetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,string & value,uint32_t & ttl)
methods.description: Retrieves a value and TTL for a given key in the store within the ACCOUNT scope if the internal store pointer is valid.

methods.name: uint32_t DeleteKey(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key)
methods.description: Deletes a specific key within the ACCOUNT scope from the store if the internal store pointer is valid.

methods.name: uint32_t DeleteNamespace(const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns)
methods.description: Deletes a namespace within the ACCOUNT scope from the store if the internal store pointer is valid.

ctags.name: CloudStoreImplementation
ctags.pattern: /^    class CloudStoreImplementation : public Exchange::IStore2, public Exchange::IConfiguration {$/

ctags.name: DeleteKey
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t DeleteKey(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns, const string& key) overri/

ctags.name: DeleteNamespace
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t DeleteNamespace(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns) override$/

ctags.name: GetValue
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t GetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns, const string& key, string&/
ctags.signature: (const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,string & value,uint32_t & ttl)

ctags.name: SetValue
ctags.pattern: /^        uint32_t SetValue(const IStore2::ScopeType, const string& ns, const string& key, const s/
ctags.signature: (const IStore2::ScopeType,const string & ns,const string & key,const string & value,const uint32_t ttl)
